channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Maono’s New PD200W Wireless Microphone Can Record Stereo And Connect With USB And XLR
item.description: This new microphone from Maono can connect in three ways including wireless. It can record in stereo and has a 30mm dynamic capsule for capturing clea...

item.title: Apple’s iPhone 17 Pro Max And iPhone Air Are Tremendous And Gimmicky, Respectively
item.description: The iPhone Air is thinner and lighter than ever but missing some crucial components of the Pro iPhones. If it were much cheaper, it’d be okay, but it’...

item.title: Employer Health Plan Lawsuits Can End Insurance Overcharges And Boost Paychecks
item.description: Health plan lawsuits for transparency of fees and overcharges can greatly lower costs, just like they did for retirement plans.

item.title: How This Innovative Strategy Turned Around A Troubled Industry
item.description: Catch shares already led the most dramatic ‘business turnaround story’ you’ve never heard of — American fisheries.

item.title: DJI Mic 3 Is The Best Wireless Mic For Anyone Who Makes Videos
item.description: Smaller, lighter, more feature packed and lower priced than the last generation.

item.title: The grid

item.title: Status vs. goodness
item.description: It’s easy to come to the conclusion that people with means and high cultural status choose things that are better. Organic vegetables instead of junk ...

item.title: The questions before the questions

item.title: Two kinds of confrontations
item.description: When we win by having someone else lose, we set up a conflict. It’s clear, direct but not generative. But when we win by confronting our fear, everyon...

item.title: Reciprocity
item.description: Our biggest commitments, the things we are most dedicated to, rarely pay us back in equal measure. That might be the point.
